effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

spells.description:
Equip: The Bashful Book may read an excerpt from an Unpublished Steamy Romance Novel to the target of your spells, dealing 110,124 Arcane damage or 137,669 healing every 2 sec for 20 sec.

If the target dies before the story is finished, the ending will be spoiled for a nearby target, dealing what remains instantly.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 337,895 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,470 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
